text: @vitalethomas @KnativeProject @holly_cummins I'm so disappointed that funtainers are a no go 😁.  But seriously, we need to come up with a better term than #serverless. I'm equally tired of showing the Scooby Doo meme where they expose what's under the hood of serverless (yes servers).

author.name: Kevin Dubois | @kevindubois@mastodon.social
